mapper.sql: ID, ASSESSMENT_ID, BILLING_CYCLE, CSS_STAFF_ID, ASSESSMENT_AMOUNT, PERSONAL_AMOUNT, ROLE_NAME, STATE, STATE_DATE, STAFF_NAME
mapper.insert: insert into STAFF_ASSESSMENT (ID, ASSESSMENT_ID, BILLING_CYCLE, CSS_STAFF_ID, ASSESSMENT_AMOUNT, PERSONAL_AMOUNT, ROLE_NAME, STATE, STATE_DATE, STAFF_NAME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{assessmentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{billingCycle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cssStaffId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{assessmentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{personalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into STAFF_ASSESSMENT
ID,
ASSESSMENT_ID,
BILLING_CYCLE,
CSS_STAFF_ID,
ASSESSMENT_AMOUNT,
PERSONAL_AMOUNT,
ROLE_NAME,
STATE,
STATE_DATE,
STAFF_NAME,

mapper.update:
update STAFF_ASSESSMENT
ASSESSMENT_ID = #{assessmentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BILLING_CYCLE = #{billingCycle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CSS_STAFF_ID = #{cssStaffId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ASSESSMENT_AMOUNT = #{assessmentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PERSONAL_AMOUNT = #{personalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE_DATE = #{stateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STAFF_NAME = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update STAFF_ASSESSMENT set ASSESSMENT_ID = #{assessmentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BILLING_CYCLE = #{billingCycle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CSS_STAFF_ID = #{cssStaffId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ASSESSMENT_AMOUNT = #{assessmentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PERSONAL_AMOUNT = #{personalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE_DATE = #{stateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STAFF_NAME = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
UPDATE STAFF_ASSESSMENT set state=#{state} ,state_date = sysdate where assessment_Id = #{assessmentId} and state not in('CLS')
mapper.select: SELECT FROM STAFF_ASSESSMENT where assessment_id = #{assessmentId} and state != 'CLS' order by id
